name: Tomtom v1.0
description:
the game will get many updates and i will make bigger maps

tomtom is a simple mummy egyptian maze in the pyramids and you need to go to the green area to be save

dont let mummy touch you

press f12 to exit game when lose or win

press r to restart game when lose or win

W,S,A,D to move

plz donate

wait for versions
